label: 野伏
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Also known as nobuseri, this word refers to skirmishers of all social rank, and not as a class" of foot soldiers as been sometimes assumed. These skirmishers were generally archers, and were indicative of the nature of fighting during the fourteenth century, when loosely scattered groups of soldiers predominated."
